ValidationRule.description: If it is a large loss, and the stage changes to 'Won' , 'Billing Complete', or 'Work Complete', it needs to check if at least one Large Loss Review has been approved unless it is T&M or Division is ES or Catastrophes
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
ISCHANGED(Stage__c) && (ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, 'Won') || ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, 'Billing Complete') || ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, 'Work Complete')) &&
Large_Loss_Flag__c = true && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Large_Loss_Status__c, 'Approved')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Estimate_Type__c , 'T&M')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Division__c , 'Emergency Svces')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Division__c , 'Catastrophes'))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: At least one Large Loss Review must be Approved before changing the stage to 'Won', 'Billing Complete', or 'Work Complete'.
